definition: to love learning is akin to knowledge, to study diligently is akin to benevolence, to know shame is akin to courage (Confucius)
pinyin: hao4 xue2 jin4 hu1 zhi1 , li4 xing2 jin4 hu1 ren2 , zhi1 chi3 jin4 hu1 yong3
containing_words.word: 好學近乎知，力行近乎仁，知恥近乎勇

sentences.english: Anyway, I promise you I'll try to focus on study from now on.
sentences.chinese: 總之我答應你，以後會好好學習。

sentences.english: Now financial firms recruit from the cream of the Ivy League.
sentences.chinese: 現在，金融公司招的都是長春藤聯盟的“三好學生”。

sentences.english: Sorry , you write on the blackboard , i understand but you speak i must think .
sentences.chinese: 這時的她在想，後悔以前怎麼就沒好好學英語呢？

sentences.english: Encourage their children to learn to make progress, to foster a positive attitude towards life of children.
sentences.chinese: 鼓舞孩子好學上進，培育孩子積極的生活態度。

sentences.english: He was enthused by biochemistry at HKUST and worked hard as he enjoyed his studies.
sentences.chinese: 科大生物化學系令他全情投入，好學不倦。

sentences.english: I find lessons well-worth the time and trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這些課程值得好好學一下。

sentences.english: Studious , willing to start from the grass-roots level.
sentences.chinese: 勤奮好學，願從基層做起。

sentences.english: The studious girl struggled to be the best in the class.
sentences.chinese: 那個勤奮好學的女孩努力成爲班裏最優秀的學生。

sentences.english: To be honest, I am a diligent and outstanding student.
sentences.chinese: 可以坦誠的說，我是一名勤奮好學的優秀學生。

sentences.english: Prior to his election, Benedict had a reputation for learning and piety.
sentences.chinese: 據記載在他當選之前他以其憐憫和好學而著稱。

sentences.english: Bo-bo was a good student who knows everything.
sentences.chinese: 後來我才知道，啵啵是三好學生呢。

sentences.english: Really? I always thought of you as being a kind of studious kid.
sentences.chinese: 真的？我一直以爲你是個勤奮好學的孩子呢。

sentences.english: Be willing to learn, continuously improve, and perfect ego.
sentences.chinese: 好學上進，不斷提高，完善自我。

sentences.english: I was honored as a" Three Virtues" in university serval times.
sentences.chinese: 我在大學裏有好幾次被評爲“三好學生”。

sentences.english: We should creat a social environment in which teachers are respected, and education is valued, knowledge sought and learning stressed.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該創造一個尊師重教，求知好學的社會氛圍。

sentences.english: At nine years old, I was the perfect student.
sentences.chinese: 九歲的我是模範學生，好學，聽話，負責任。
